title: The Coolest CUSTOM RTX 2080 Ti / 2080 Cards We Found!
description: The NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti,  RTX 2080 and RTX 2070 GPUs have just been announced but companies like EVGA, ASUS and MSI are already showing their own custom cards.  These are some of the coolest ones we found so far!  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Subscribe    Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:  Join Our Folding team   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #rtx2080ti #rtx2080 rtx2070 #hardwarecanucks
